name: The Facility (itch)
description:
Ted Small and Antonio Lepore set out to make a game in one week, this is the result. The project was started on January 13th 2020 and completed January 19th, enjoy!

So far only the one level, we will be expanding the game in February.

Controls:

  • Mouse and Keyboard

ASWD to move, Space to jump, Left Mouse to attack, Right Mouse to shield

  • Gamepad (Xbox)

Left Stick to move, Y to jump, B to attack, X to shield

Theme: Illusions

Title: The Facility

Concept: Battle through enemies as you break into a top secret, heavily guarded facility to recover files from the mainframe in the control room!

Product Info: Side scrolling action, Castlevania style, sci-fi, Unity.

Outline: run and jump on platforms while avoiding/ destroying enemies in your way. Make it to the entrance of the facility.
